author: bencos17
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed Enhanced SquawkExample.

This enhanced cog demonstrates advanced integration with the SkySearch SquawkAlertAPI, featuring:
- 🚨 Real-time alert detection and logging
- 📊 Alert history tracking and statistics
- 🔄 Automatic message updates
- ⚙️ Configurable tracking settings

Use `[p]squawkexample` to get started!

**Note:** This cog requires the SkySearch cog to be loaded first.
name: squawkexample
short: Enhanced cog for SquawkAlertAPI integration with message updating
description: An enhanced example cog that demonstrates advanced integration with the SkySearch SquawkAlertAPI. Features include real-time alert detection, message updating capabilities, alert history tracking, statistics, and configurable settings. Shows developers how to register callbacks, handle squawk alert events, and update existing messages from the SkySearch cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores alert history data including timestamps, aircraft information, and guild information for tracking purposes. No personal user data is stored.
